gobblin.runtime.util

Class StateStores

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.runtime.util.StateStores

  • public class StateStores
extends Object
    state stores used for storing work units and task states

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      StateStore<MultiWorkUnit> mwuStateStore 
      StateStore<TaskState> taskStateStore 
      StateStore<WorkUnit> wuStateStore 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StateStores(Config config, Path taskStoreBase, String taskStoreTable, Path workUnitStoreBase, String workUnitStoreTable)
      Creates the state stores under storeBase WorkUnits will be stored under storeBase/_workunits/subdir/filename.(m)wu TaskStates will be stored under storeBase/_taskstates/subdir/filename.tst Some state stores such as the MysqlStateStore do not preserve the path prefix of storeRoot.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • taskStateStore

        public final StateStore<TaskState> taskStateStore

    • Constructor Detail

      • StateStores

        public StateStores(Config config,
                   Path taskStoreBase,
                   String taskStoreTable,
                   Path workUnitStoreBase,
                   String workUnitStoreTable)
        Creates the state stores under storeBase WorkUnits will be stored under storeBase/_workunits/subdir/filename.(m)wu TaskStates will be stored under storeBase/_taskstates/subdir/filename.tst Some state stores such as the MysqlStateStore do not preserve the path prefix of storeRoot. In those cases only the last three components of the path determine the key for the data.
        Parameters:
        config - config properties
        taskStoreBase - the base directory that holds the store root for the task state store
